daily_activities: Arrival in Reykjavik, check-in to hotel and explore the city
Visit the Hallgrimskirkja church and the Harpa concert hall
Golden Circle tour: visit Thingvellir National Park, Geysir geothermal area, and Gullfoss waterfall
South Coast tour: visit Seljalandsfoss and Skogafoss waterfalls, and the black sand beach of Reynisfjara
Snaefellsnes Peninsula tour: visit the picturesque towns of Arnarstapi and Hellnar
Explore the beautiful glaciers of Vatnajokull and Oxnadalur
Visit the Diamond Beach and the Jokulsarlon glacier lagoon
Take a guided tour to the stunning waterfalls of Hraunfossar and Barnafoss
Relax in the geothermal waters of the Blue Lagoon
Explore the vibrant city of Reykjavik, visit the Laugavegur shopping street and the Old Harbour
Take a day trip to the Westman Islands, known for their natural beauty and puffin colonies
Visit the stunning Godafoss waterfall and the Lake Myvatn area
Explore the beautiful Akureyri city, known as the capital of the north
Take a guided hike on the beautiful trails of the Trollaskagi Peninsula
Return to Reykjavik, visit the Perlan museum and enjoy a farewell dinner

travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight to a major European airport such as London (LHR) or Amsterdam (AMS), then connect to a flight to Keflavik International Airport (KEF) in Iceland.
